trans-unit.source: Interactively controls a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 대화형으로 제어는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a ClockController to interactively begin, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, and remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: ClockController를 사용 하 여 대화형으로 시작, 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 검색, 건너뛰기, 중지 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> 를 제거 하려면

trans-unit.source: You can only interactively control root-level clocks.
trans-unit.target: 루트 수준의 클럭만 대화형으로 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> to begin at the next tick.
trans-unit.target: 대상을 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>다음 틱에 시작 되도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: This method causes the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> to behave as though its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> were set to the time of the next tick.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 대상 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>것 처럼 동작 하도록 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>다음 틱의 시간으로 설정 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: The timeline's actual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> setting is ignored (but not changed).
trans-unit.target: 타임 라인의 실제 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>설정은 무시 됩니다 (이지만 변경 되지 않습니다).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> 대상 클록의 변경합니다

trans-unit.source: The Begin method does not resume a paused clock.
trans-unit.target: Begin 메서드에 일시 중지 된 클록 다시 시작 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음 번 틱을 처리할 때까지 타이밍 트리에 영향을 주지는.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events will also not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: 파생 작업으로 적절 한 이벤트는 또한 발생 하지 그때 까지는.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 이 제어 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 이 제어 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> from progressing.
trans-unit.target: 대상 중지 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 의 처리를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can pause a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>clock의 현재 상태와 일시 중지에 관계 없이 현재 상태는 변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 클록 일시 중지할 수 동안 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to unpause a clock is by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 클록 일시 중지를 해제 하는 유일한 방법은는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock implicitly pauses its children.
trans-unit.target: 클록을 암시적으로 일시 중지 자식을 일시 중지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method when the target clock is already paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 대상 클록 이미 일시 중지 된 경우이 메서드를 호출 해도 아무 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: 클록 트리거 일시 중지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> from the properties it animates.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 이 연관 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> 애니메이션 효과가 적용 된 속성에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The clock and its child clocks will no longer affect these properties.
trans-unit.target: 시계 및 해당 자식 clock에는 이러한 속성을 지정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 트리거합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was previously paused to resume progressing.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하도록 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 는 이전에 일시 중지 된 진행을 재개 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can pause or resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing or resuming a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 하거나 다시 시작할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>clock의 현재 상태 및 일시 중지 하거나 재개 하는 것에 관계 없이 현재 상태는 변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 클록 일시 중지할 수 동안 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to resume a paused clock is by using the Resume method.
trans-unit.target: Resume 메서드를 사용 하 여 일시 중지 된 시계를 다시 시작 하는 유일한 방법은 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a clock implicitly resumes its children.
trans-unit.target: 암시적으로 clock 자식 다시 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on a clock that is not paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 되지 않은 클록에서이 메서드를 호출 해도 아무 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a paused clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 된 클록 트리거를 다시 시작은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> by the specified amount when the next tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: 대상 검색 (seek) <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>다음 틱이 발생할 때 지정된 된 크기 여.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: 대상 클록이 중지 되 면 검색 하면 다시 활성화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Seek 작업을 사용 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>이 시계의 타임이 라인의 설정을 고려: 클록의 타임 라인에 처럼 처리 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> 클록의 변경합니다

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음 번 틱을 처리할 때까지 타이밍 트리에 영향을 주지는.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: 파생 작업으로 적합 한 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 그때 까지는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 스토리 보드 트리거 검색는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 자식이 대상 클록의 현재 시간 그에 따라 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: Seek 오프셋이 대상 클록의 시간 단위로 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: 클록의 기준으로이 오프셋은 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>의 값에 따라 `origin`합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 오프셋이 대상 클록의 기준으로 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> by the specified amount immediately.
trans-unit.target: 대상 검색 (seek) <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 즉시를 지정 된 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: 대상 클록이 중지 되 면 검색 하면 다시 활성화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Seek 작업을 사용 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>이 시계의 타임이 라인의 설정을 고려: 클록의 타임 라인에 처럼 처리 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: SeekAlignedToLastTick aligns the seeked time of the clock with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: SeekAlignedToLastTick은 seeked 시간을 마지막 클록 틱 효과 맞춥니다.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to SeekAlignedToLastTick, even though the screen will not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: 값은 있지만 화면에는 화면 업데이트 될 때까지이 변경 내용이 반영 되지 SeekAlignedToLastTick, 때문에 변경 내용을 반영 하도록 즉시 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 자식이 대상 클록의 현재 시간 그에 따라 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> 클록의 변경합니다

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 스토리 보드 트리거 검색는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: Seek 오프셋이 대상 클록의 시간 단위로 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: 클록의 기준으로이 오프셋은 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>의 값에 따라 `origin`합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 오프셋이 대상 클록의 기준으로 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: 대상의 현재 시간을 이동 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> 활성 기간의 끝에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the target clock's current time to the end of its active period; the clock's behavior at this point is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> setting of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 대상 클록의 이동은 활성 기간의 끝으로 현재 시간 이 시점에서 클록의 동작이 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> 의 설정</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> 에 따라 지정 되어

trans-unit.source: If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock fills; if the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock stops.
trans-unit.target: 경우 타임 라인의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>는 속성이로 설정 된 경우 클록 채웁니다; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, 클록 중지.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> 대상 클록의 경우에만 적용

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음 번 틱을 처리할 때까지 타이밍 트리에 영향을 주지는.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: 파생 작업으로 적합 한 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 그때 까지는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Advancing a storyboard to its fill period triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 스토리 보드의 채우기 기간 트리거 당기지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interactive speed of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 대상의 대화형 속도 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect until the next tick.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정는 다음 틱까지 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property and then get its value before the next tick occurs, you'll get the old value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하 고 다음 하기 전에 해당 값을 가져올 경우 다음 틱이 발생할 이전 값을 얻게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This property will return the new value after the next tick.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 다음 틱 후 새 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not change the value of the underlying timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 해도 기본 타임 라인의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> 값 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property triggers the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: 대상 클록의 트리거합니다이 속성을 설정할 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than zero that describes the interactive speed of the target clock.
trans-unit.target: 대상 클록의 대화형 속도 설명 하는&0; 보다 큰 유한 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This value is multiplied against the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> of the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>. For example, if the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> is 0.5 and the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> object's SpeedRatio is 3.0, the timeline moves at 1.5 times normal speed (0.5 * 3.0).
trans-unit.target: 이 값의 값을 곱해는 <> </> *> 클록의의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>합니다. 예를 들어 경우 타임 라인의 <> </> *>은 0.5 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> 1.5 배 보통 속도 (0.5 * 3.0)로 이동 개체의 동안 3.0 이면 타임 라인입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 1.0입니다.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 대상 중지 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> 대상 클록의 변경합니다

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> clock can be restarted by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>시계를 사용 하 여 다시 시작할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음 번 틱을 처리할 때까지 타이밍 트리에 영향을 주지는.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: 파생 작업으로 적합 한 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 그때 까지는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 클록 트리거 중지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>이벤트 하지 않고는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>
